alert.note: Alert for Niagara; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 10:38PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Heavy showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Niagara and western Orleans Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1036 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lewiston to near Holley. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Lockport, Medina, Newfane, Lewiston, Youngstown, Middleport, Waterport, Fort Niagara State Park, Sanborn, Lakeside Beach State Park, Ridgeway, Shelby, Wilson, Lyndonville, Barker, Cambria Center, Olcott, Ransomville, Gasport and Knowlesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these showers and storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
